Description: Large apartments, plentiful upgrades, and amenities that's what you'll find at Peppertree Farm Apartments in Silver Spring, MD! Our apartments for rent offer everything you need for home, health, and relaxation including a cozy clubhouse with fireside lounge, fitness center, and Olympic-sized swimming pool. Peppertree Farm also has a business center with Internet access, an on-site day care, and gorgeous views from your private balcony or patio. * Conveniently located near the Glenmont Metro (Red Line), Georgia Avenue, Bel Pre Road, and Connecticut Avenue, Peppertree Farm makes getting around town and to the Washington, DC area so much easier! You'll love having quick access to Aspen Hill Shopping Center, Kohl's, Home Depot, Giant, and Kmart, as well as Georgian Forest Elementary School.

Description: Portico at Silver Spring Metro boasts remarkable amenities, an ideal location, and stylish apartments in Silver Spring, MD. Minutes from the 495 beltway, Portico is a short walk from downtown Silver Spring and 500 feet to the Red Line Metro - granting easy access to downtown Washington DC. After a long day, drop your car off in our covered parking garage then work off the day's stress in our state-of-the-art fitness center or refresh and refuel by taking a stroll on the grounds in nearby Harmony Gardens. Enjoy international cuisine, cafes, fine retail, music, the AFI movie theater, and the best of Silver Spring and Washington DC just steps from your door. Your Silver Spring luxury apartment comes with sleek, black, energy efficient appliances and spacious closets with select apartments boasting dens, washer/dryers, and spectacular views. Visit us today for a personalized tour and experience luxury apartment living in Maryland.

Our beautiful apartment community offers spacious and convenient one and two bedroom apartments. Each of our lavishly built apartments includes exclusive gourmet kitchens, large living areas, spacious closets and washer and dryers in each apartment for your convenience. The Birches offers residents full access to top-notch amenities. Enjoy our cardio studio and car wash area. Have a beautiful day out near the gorgeous swimming pool during the summer or have a family picnic in our outdoor picnic courtyard. The Birches has something to offer for everyone. The Birches is in the center of it all, providing access to activities and culture. Enjoy countless parks and nature trails while also being located just 11 miles north of Washing

Description: Say "hello" to home at The Parc at Woodlake. These stunning luxury apartments in Silver Spring, MD have become a resident favorite. Located just minutes from I-95, I-495, BW Parkway and equidistant to Washington, D.C. and Baltimore, these Silver Spring apartments provide a superb commuting location for those who don't want to sacrifice their entire paycheck to afford the modern amenities you deserve. Large, light-filled residences deliver surprising touches like sunken living rooms and cozy breakfast nooks. Comfortable bedrooms offer abundant closet and storage space. And each unit is appointed with a full-sized washer and dryer. So instead of fighting your neighbors over laundry room time, you can spend that time getting to know them. Feeling shy? Let us lead the way. These apartments in Silver Spring, MD encourage you to rub elbows with your neighbors. Developed and managed by The Tower Companies, The Pearl provides the ultimate setting for a healthy and connected lifestyle. Avery Park is just two miles from the University of Maryland and the sprawling, new FDA (Federal Drug Administration) campus. Living in your beautiful apartment home, you're minutes from the diverse shopping, restaurants and entertainment options of downtown Silver Springs. Here at home, enjoy our popular amenities such as an Olympic-sized swimming pool w/sundeck, Cyber Cafe and well-equipped Fitness Center. Visit us soon and stroll our manicured grounds and elegant courtyards. Soon you can be living here in your own spacious apartment home and have it all at your fingertips.

Description: The Veridian Apartments in Silver Spring, MD features Art Deco architecture, an eco-friendly green roof and a short walk to Silver Spring Metro. Our convenient location is just 3.5 miles from downtown Bethesda and minutes from shopping, restaurants, entertainment and events in Washington D.C. Your home includes amazing views from the oversized balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows, as well as hardwood floors, granite countertops, energy efficient appliances and an in-home washer and dryer. Relax at the beautiful rooftop pool or work out in one of our two fitness centers. Enjoy the on-site convenience store and our 24-hour concierge to handle your every need.

Description:
Picnic. Swim. Rest at ease with the kids at the playground.
Northgate apartments are nestled in a park setting of stately oaks, colorful maples, and evergreen pines. We've used nature's beauty to its best advantage.
Northgate's one, two, and three bedroom apartments offer sophisticated conveniences lacking in most rental properties. Fully carpeted, self cleaning ovens, frost free refrigerators, washer and dryers in each unit, easy to clean ceramic tile in the bathroom. Our two and three bedroom models feature two full bathrooms. You'll appreciate our sound proofing features and you'll find storage space for everything in Fibber McGee's closet. You'll have eat-in space in the roomy kitchen. You'll have entertaining space in the L-shaped dining and living room. And you'll enjoy the wide open spaces from your balcony or patio.

Description: At Glenmont Forest Apartments, our natural stone and timber entry is a fitting gateway to what awaits you beyond. No apartment community enjoys a more naturally appealing setting. From the overhead canopies of tall oaks, maples, and dogwoods to the rolling green hills and shady picnic areas, the private swim club and play areas, Glenmont Forest surrounds you with brilliant color and spectacular scenery. Yet, just outside the entry, a world of conveniences await you. Shopping at Glenmont Center is a short distance, as is the popular Wheaton Regional Park and the Glenmont Metrorail Station. Westfield Wheaton Mall is only a 5-minute drive. Whether you're headed to Silver Spring, Bethesda or Rockville, you're less than 10 minutes away. Add to this a spacious, sun-filled efficiency, one, two, or three-bedroom apartment home with an array of special amenities, and a professional staff dedicated to your personal comfort. It all adds up to a one-of-a-kind lifestyle. Naturally, we're convinced there's nothing like Glenmont Forest. We hope you are, too.Call today to schedule an appointment to tour your new home!

Description: Welcome to Fenwick - a vibrant community where eclectic history meets modern sophistication. Choose from brand new studios, one- or two-bedroom apartments with first-rate finishes and distinguished architecture. Walk to the Silver Spring transit station or stay home and enjoy the luxury amenities. Fenwick celebrates the unique neighborhoods and history that surround it. Description: At Montgomery Trace you'll be able to enjoy the quiet comfort of suburban living with all the perks of city living. Imagine residing in a community that's centered around your needs with brand new remodeled apartments including designer kitchens and baths as well as a new outdoor fitness and dog park. Downtown Silver Spring is a nationally recognized community for smart growth and achievement. With our apartments close to the Glenmont Metro, ICC Route 200 and I-495 - you'll have easy access to Rockville, Bethesda and Washington DC. Our community is also convenient to Wheaton, Chevy Chase, and Gaithersburg as well as the Bethesda Naval Medical Center and The National Institutes of Health (NIH). Surrounded by restaurants, entertainment and shopping, you'll love living in our Silver Spring apartments - we are the only community in the area that offers it all!

Description: Located on the outskirts of Silver Spring, Maryland, Windsor Court and Tower Apartments is the perfect place to call home. Our welcoming community offers spacious one, two, and three bedroom apartments. Each unit features a private patio/balcony, walk-in closet, and beautiful granite kitchen countertops. Our family friendly community includes a playground, a pool, and an on-site daycare with discounts for residents. Within walking distance are Greencastle Elementary and Paint Branch High School. We also offer a basketball court and business center, as well as convenient off-street parking. Windsor Court and Tower Apartments is in the perfect location for a quick and easy commute. The Silver Spring bus line has stops at both entrances of our community, and the Express Bus pick-up to the Silver Spring Metro Station is a short walk down the street. We are located with convenient access to Baltimore, MD and Washington D.C. via the ICC 200 expressway, I-95, and Route 29. We have no doubt that you will love living at Windsor Court and Tower Apartments, where your home is your castle. Take a walkthrough video tour today to find the floorplan that is right for you!

Description:
Hewitt Gardens offers it all: the secluded park setting; the serenity of the near -country-like living; and the nearness to the conveniences and the essentials. Located in Montgomery County - the heart of the finest suburban living in the area - you can enjoy at its ultimate and at its most affordable prices.
You will be within walking distance of elementary, junior and senior high schools - as well as many religious institutions. Metrobus, Ride-On and Glenmont Metrorail station are nearby. Shopping is just as easy because you're within minutes of department stores and shopping centers.
At Hewitt Gardens, you'll experience the reasons why Montgomery County has a well deserved reputation as one of America's greatest living spots. Enjoy organized recreational and athletic programs, scenic parks, lakes and open space. Theaters, excellent restaurants, and other facilities are readily available to the discerning resident.
Enjoy the easy living. Inside your apartment, you will bask in your own individually controlled environment featuring air conditioning and energy efficient gas heat. The spacious, oversized rooms are designed to give you the "room to roam." There are separate dining rooms in each apartment. Closets Galore and so much more!

Description: Welcome to Knights Bridge I Apartment Homes, a conveniently located apartment community in Silver Spring, MD that offers uniquely designed floor plans to suit all your needs. Our residents choose Knights Bridge I for its unmatched convenience, right off Route 29 and just a half block from restaurants, shopping and services of Briggs Chaney Plaza. You're also only minutes from the racquetball, tennis courts, fitness center and ball fields of the Fairland Regional Park. You'll find incomparable apartment homes featuring one-of-a-kind sunlit cafe breakfast rooms, dramatically angled balconies, grand living areas and extra wall space for decorating. All of our apartment homes offer washers and dryers and dual-entry kitchens. You’ll also enjoy special highlights such as designer mini-blinds and deep wood windowsills. What's more, you'll be living in a Grady managed community known for its exceptional communities and people since 1965! Be sure to ask about Sure Deposit, a security deposit alternative starting as low as $218.75! Contact one of our Marketing Consultants for a tour today.

Description: At Yorkshire, your views on luxury, privacy and convenience are about to take on the most exciting new angles in all of Montgomery County. From the prominent arched entryways to the solid all brick construction, everything about Yorkshire suggests a richer quality of life. Open the door to your apartment home and it only gets better. Dramatic highlights such as upper level cathedral ceilings and living room skylights, sun-splashed designer kitchens, and spectacular dual master suite apartments offer endless design opportunities. In addition to these exceptional amenities, Yorkshire puts an even greater emphasis on personal privacy. Our exclusive concrete flooring system and wall-to-wall carpeting maximize sound conditioning and utility cost savings. The eat-in kitchens with built-in microwaves and the separate laundry alcove with washer and dryer provide ultimate comfort inside your home. Please call for an appointment today. Lease 24/7.

Description: If you want a relaxed and spacious neighborhood setting with accessibility to the Washington Beltway, the Silver Spring-Columbia Route 29 corridor, the ICC and Metro, the best of both worlds awaits you at Oak Hill. Unique and spacious floor plans offer room-sized terraces and balconies overlooking wide expanses of beautifully landscaped and manicured lawns. The grounds are studded with majestic trees and barbeque grill/picnic areas. You will love the oasis of Oak Hill. Just minutes from the Washington Beltway located on Route 29, Oak Hill offers easy access to Washington, DC and the newly revitalized downtown Silver Spring. Situated on well-groomed acres in the heart of a busy metropolitan, adjacent to the White Oak Shopping Center, Oak Hill offers convenience to many essentials. Nestled close to churches, Montgomery County Schools, the new White Oak Recreation Center, golf course and recreational areas, Oak Hill is all you dream of. We feature wall-to-wall carpet, window treatments, & fully equipped kitchens (microwave, frost-free refrigerator, dishwasher, gas cooking and pantry). Our apartment homes come with central air conditioning, cable ready, laundry facilities and storage. You can sit back and enjoy the serene park like setting or jump into the fun at the playground or pool. Come visit Oak Hill Apartments!

Description: The perfect combination of convenience and quiet, comfortable living make Hermitage Square the ideal location for your new apartment home in Wheaton/Silver Spring. Surrounded by woods in a serene park-like setting, our apartment homes offer you plenty of living space at an affordable price. Hermitage Square is served by the Montgomery County school system, one of the finest in the United States. Ideally located off Georgia Avenue, our community is only minutes away from the Capital Beltway, Glenmont Metro (Red Line), shopping centers, and a myriad of restaurants. The newly-built Inter-County Connector (ICC) is nearby and serves to shorten driving time around the area. During the summer, residents enjoy our pool and spending time with their families at the Wheaton Regional Park.

Description: Welcome to Crystal Springs, where our residents are our top priority! Choose from one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments for rent, featuring modern updates such as granite countertops, hardwood flooring, washer/dryer and much more in select homes! Location is everything at Crystal Springs Apartments! Right off of Georgia Avenue, easy access to Glenmont Metro with on site bus stops, quick drive to I-95, I-495, ICC MD-200, and Route 28, make getting to your favorite destinations a breeze! You're close to Olney, Rockville, Wheaton, and NW Washington, DC. Conveniently located close to Wheaton Mall, Giant, Safeway, Wells Fargo, SunTrust, PNC, McDonalds, Outback Steakhouse, Rock Creek Park, Chipotle, Panera Bread, Starbucks, and many more retail, dining, and grocery stores! Crystal Springs in Silver Spring, MD evoke the feeling of a quaint, country home with its brick-faced buildings, landscaped courtyards, and beautiful views from your private balcony or patio. While you'll feel like you're in the country, these apartments are minutes from Silver Spring's lively downtown. Welcome home to Crystal Springs, where comfort and convenience count!

Description: Find city life made easy at Metro 710. The granite countertop-stainless steel appliances-steps to the Metro lifestyle is yours today at Metro 710. Located in vibrant Silver Spring, Maryland, Metro 710 apartments have been designed to elevate your everyday. Shake up martinis in your new kitchen before catching a premiere at the AFI. We are. Welcome home!

Description: About Us * Sky Properties manages 6-unit garden-style apartment buildings 10 minutes outside of Washington, DC and just minutes from the Beltway in the sought-after Montgomery County suburb of Takoma Park/Silver Spring. Many of the buildings are located near Wayne and Flower Avenues, while others overlook Sligo Creek Park. Most apartment buildings are within walking distance to the Silver Spring Metro Station. * Convenient Location * There is no need for a car when you live at Sky Properties. The J-4 Metro bus stops close to our buildings and provides direct access to Bethesda and College Park, while the Silver Spring and Takoma Park Metro Red Line stations are only 10-15 minutes away on Montgomery County's Ride-On bus service. Washington, DC's Union Station is just under 30 minutes away. * The University of Maryland campus in College Park is only 10 minutes away on their shuttle, which stops nearby. We are also close to Columbia Union College, Walter Reed Army Medical Center, the Food and Drug Administration (FDA), the National Security Agency (NSA), NASA's Goddard Space Flight Center, the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Discovery Communications, and the American Film Institute (AFI). Minutes away are two of the area's premier music and performance venues, Strathmore Hall in Rockville, MD and Clarisse Smith Center, on the Campus of the University of Maryland. * Great Neighborhood * The Long Branch neighborhood is friendly, active, and bursting with amenities. Sky Properties residents can walk to restaurants, shops, banks, a dry cleaner, a movie theatre, 2 supermarkets, and more in a nearby shopping center, while the Silver Spring/Takoma Park Food Coop, Whole Foods, and Trader Joe's are a short drive away. * Sligo Creek Park is a short walk away, where you can enjoy playgrounds, picnic areas, tennis courts, a golf course, and a 10.2 mile long paved trail for hiking and biking. The nearby Long Branch Community Center offers a pool, fitness center, and year round activities, and the Pyramid Atlantic Art Center offers numerous educational programs. You can walk to Rolling Terrace Elementary School and the neighborhood branch of the Montgomery County Public Library. Class Act Arts holds events and workshops that are open to the public and a Saturday Morning Children's Series at the Robert E. Parilla Performing Arts Center at Montgomery College. * Beautiful Apartments * Sky Properties offers light and airy studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom a

The community offers easy access to downtown Silver Spring, Baltimore, and Washington DC from Interstate 95, Interstate 495, and is just one block from the Park & Ride. The one and two bedroom apartments for rent offer washer and dryers, private patios or balconies, black appliances, wood style flooring, and additional outside storage. Some apartments may boast premium finishes such as espresso cabinetry with nickel hardware, new granite style counter-tops, and updated lighting. Description: Hampton Point Apartments are located in Silver Spring, MD and offers a selection of one and two bedroom apartments for rent. You will find premium finishes are the standard at Hampton Point which include light maple cabinetry, brushed nickel accents, and washer and dryer in every apartment. As a Milestone Management Community our residents enjoy online resident services and bill pay and 24-hour emergency maintenance service. All of this combined with a great location minutes to US Route-29, the MD-200 Intercounty Connector, Washington DC and Baltimore make Hampton Point the perfect place to relax and unwind.

Description: Fall into your new home at Citron Apartments! Please see office for further details on our current pricing! Upscale Apartments in the Heart of Downtown Silver Spring's never ending excitement. There was a time when people held salons, intimate gatherings of literary, artistic and cultural movers and shakers. At Citron, that era is back, in all its creative glory. Citron is an intimate counterpoint to its high-rise neighbors. A haven of serenity and elevated consciousness in the heart of Downtown Silver Spring's never-ending excitement. Amenity-rich, filled with features, green and sustainable, and always forward-thinking. There's a true sense of community here, with easily accessed gathering areas that invite social interaction, from light conversation to deep contemplation. Make time to get together with Citron Apartments.

Description:
Spacious 1 bedroom,1 bath condo in the highly desired Mica Condo. Hardwoods throughout, carpet in bedroom. Rent includes water, gas and electric. Building has gym, party room and pool. Onsite management M-F. Steps to shopping, Metro (SS on red line), DC, Rock Creek Park, 495.
Unit Amenities
? 6th floor unit with over 820 square feet
? Stainless steel appliances
? Corner unit offers privacy; concrete walls between units so noise is never a problem
? Private balcony
? Granite counter-tops in the bathroom, kitchen and dining areas
? Plenty of closet space: walk-in closet in the master bedroom & coat closet in the hallway 
? High-efficiency washer and dryer in unit
? Room darkening shades in the bedroom
? Individually controlled heat/AC
Building Amenities
? Secure entry with on-site management office
? State-of-the-art fitness center
? Outdoor pool
? Multipurpose room for social events
? Pet-friendly building
Neighborhood Amenities
? 1 Block to Silver Spring Metro and bus terminal
? Across the street from Giant Foods, 24-hour CVS, dry cleaners and various restaurants
? Walking distance to Rock Creek park
? Short walk to Silver Spring Arts & Entertainment District, Whole Foods, NOAA, Discovery 
Security deposit = 1 months rent

Pet Policy: Dogs and Cats Allowed

Description: 5 minute walk to Silver Spring Metro (and future Purple Line station) and the shops, restaurants and entertainment of Downtown Silver Spring. Features living room, dining room, half bath, renovated kitchen with island, stainless steel appliances, breakfast nook and walk out to balcony on second level. 2 bedrooms (both with walk-in closets) and 2.5 baths on third level. Third bedroom on fourth level and family room with gas fireplace on first level with entrance to 2 car private garage.

Description:
1 Bedroom
1 Bathroom
all utilities included
Laundry Facilities
Street Parking
Radiator Heat. (Management Controlled)
A/C fee required depending on the BTU of A/C.
Tenant must purchase their own A/C .
A $50 fee will be charge for the installation of each air-conditioning unit. This one-time fee will include both the installation and removal of each air-conditioning unit. If your unit was initially installed by the window company as part of a window replacement project, there will be no charge for its removal by our company.
Note: The application usually takes 2 to 3 working days to process depending upon the accuracy of the information provided on the application and how quickly employers, current landlords and previous landlords respond to our inquiry. You will be notified if your application was accepted or declined. all adults 18 years and older must complete an application the application fee is $35.00 dollars (per applicant). Your application fee is not refundable under any circumstances. The applications are processed by our processing center. Once the application has been reviewed by the processing center, the application is referred to a SLPM property manager to inform the applicant(s) of the results. Application processors do not communicate directly with applicants and only make tenant selections based on the merit of the application and supporting documentation. Sorry pets are not allowed. Most rental agreements have a minimum 12 month term. You may request a longer lease subject to written approval of the property owner.

Description :
2 Bedroom
1 Bathroom
water, gas, and heat included in the rent.
Tenant pays their own electricity
Laundry Facilities
Street Parking
Radiator Heat. (Management Controlled)
A/C fee required depending on the BTU of A/C.
Tenant must purchase their own A/C .
A $50 fee will be charge for the installation of each air-conditioning unit. This one-time fee will include both the installation and removal of each air-conditioning unit. If your unit was initially installed by the window company as part of a window replacement project, there will be no charge for its removal by our company.
Note: The application usually takes 2 to 3 working days to process depending upon the accuracy of the information provided on the application and how quickly employers, current landlords and previous landlords respond to our inquiry. You will be notified if your application was accepted or declined. all adults 18 years and older must complete an application the application fee is $35.00 dollars (per applicant). Your application fee is not refundable under any circumstances. The applications are processed by our processing center. Once the application has been reviewed by the processing center, the application is referred to a SLPM property manager to inform the applicant(s) of the results. Application processors do not communicate directly with applicants and only make tenant selections based on the merit of the application and supporting documentation. Sorry pets are not allowed. Most rental agreements have a minimum 12 month term. You may request a longer lease subject to written approval of the property owner.

Pet Policy: No Pets Allowed

Description:
Gorgeous townhome!!!
2021 Lyttonsville Rd., Silver Spring, MD 20910
- 3 bedroom, 3.5 bath
- 3-level townhome 
- Master bedroom has loft, with lots of closet space
- New carpet (in fact so new that'll be installed next week)
- Large deck 
- Finished basement
- Great Location, close to Metro, restaurants, theater, downtown Silver Spring
- Close to worship locations
- No smoking
- Close to I-495
Lease Term: 12 month minimum
Rent: $2700 Deposit: $2700 
Application Fee: $60 per adult for credit and background checks

Description:
Large, light-filled, and tastefully renovated one bedroom with den/solarium in excellent condition. 
Features:
-	Enormous master bedroom with renovated bathroom
-	Renovated, sun-filled, eat-in kitchen.
-	Many large closets, including two walk-ins, provide for plentiful storage space.
-	Indoor assigned parking available for additional fee
-	Sunny solarium serves as a den/guest room.
-	Spectacular penthouse views to the National Cathedral and downtown Bethesda 
-	Quiet corner-unit apartment
-	Hardwood and marble floors.
-	Full capacity washer and dryer. 
Leisure World is a senior citizen community with many amenities. All residents must be at least 55 years old. THIS APARTMENT MUST BE SEEN TO BE APPRECIATED.

You will fall in love with your gourmet kitchen which features Granite Countertops, Oversized Cabinets, Stainless Steel Appliances, Breakfast Bar and Built in Microwaves. No thought or finish was left out including Full Size Washer and Dryers, Walk-in Closets, Enormous Bathrooms with Ceramic Tile Floor, Unique Floor Plans and Solar Energy. Your Galaxy home will offer you spectacular living. Call us to set up a visit today.

Description: Adorable rambler in Indian Springs. Nice airy living spaces great flow updated kitchen and bathrooms! Fireplace large fenced yard w/shed (gardening and lawn tools included) walk-out partially finished basement and a STUNNING screened in porch perfect for relaxation and entertaining! This picture perfect property is located near 4 corners & I-495!!

Freshly Painted with COMPLETELY RENOVATED FULL BATH & KITCHEN new windows near bus line METRO and U of MD Free Shuttle small building. 1 assigned parking space ample street parking. Upper level features master bedroom and 2 additional bedrooms plus renovated full bath. LL features laundry room gorgeous bathroom and 2 additional bedrooms. Large rear yard boasts fabulous deck and pretty landscaping. Two car driveway. Super close commuter routes shops & Sligo Creek Park

Description: The tenants are gone and this townhouse looks great!. The kitchen has an eating area a large pantry and recent upgrades including the stove refrigerator counter tops and flooring. A slider leads from the kitchen to a cozy deck. The finished basement has a full bath rec room washer/dryer utility closet and a slider to the area under the deck. Heating and cooling are electric. No Pets please

Description: Fabulous location in a quiet neighborhood on a cul-de-sac. Well-maintained Brick 4-level split w/4 BRs 2.5 BA hardwood floors thruout Living Room w/wood-burning Fireplace updated Kitchen freshly painted Patio and enclosed large level yard with minutes to 495 Parks shopping dining and METRO. Pets on a case by case basis and non-smoking property.

Description: Spacious 3 level split near Glenmont Metro. Driveway for off-street parking. Deck overlooking private back yard. Office in lower level may be used as 4th bedroom. Brick fireplace in living room. Lower level includes family room. New appliances in spacious kitchen. Renters insurance required by owner at move-in. Convenient to ICC. No pets. Avail immediately upon credit/application approval.

(610) 520-1100 x1 - Spacious Townhome on Quiet Steet Backing a Wooded Preserve - Beautiful 3 BR/2.5 BA townhome with two-car garage built in 2010 with lots of upgrades., Conveniently located on a quiet street right off Rt. 200 near Rt. 29. 
Lower level includes 2-car garage with Colorado-inspired covered outdoor breezeway to foyer entrance that opens to a walk-out recreation room. A tot lot located directly across the street.
Open floor plan on the main level with hardwood floors, a coffered ceiling and gas fireplace. Gourmet kitchen with marble counter tops and stainless appliances opens to 12x12 deck overlooking a protected wooded preserve.
Brand new carpeting on third level and a generous master bedroom suite with cathedral ceiling and two walk-in closets. Luxurious master bath with brand new marble tile, dual granite vanities, jetted shower and roman tub. Two additional bedrooms on this level with full ceramic tile bath; laundry center on bedroom level.
(RLNE3584966) Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.

Welcome home to your wonderful next house that features renovated and expanded kitchen, sun room, finished basement, big living room, spacious dining room, office, den, you name it, we got it. As if that wasn't enough, the stone patio is great for BBQing and the yard.... wow, the yard.... is enormous. 
Please email Scott Goldberg at Scott@StreamlineManagement.com to see this great property today!

Description:
(301) 339-8850 - Beautifully updated. Attached garage, finished basement - Beautiful and spacious home in Silver Spring. Come enjoy the tranquility of the landscaped backyard and patio while staying close to major commute routes and downtown Silver Spring.
Main level offers a beautiful living room, with a separate dining room and upgraded kitchen with lovely counter-tops. this level exits to a sunroom and a landscaped backyard with a lovely shaded patio. Upstairs you will find 3 bedrooms, and a full bathroom. All hardwood floors and great light throughout. The basement is fully finished with a family room and a full bathroom as well. This bathroom has a bidet. 
Home has a lovely front yard, new walkway, attached 1-car garage and driveway. No pets please. A must see!
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3488340) Other Amenities - Other- sunroom, hardwood floors, separate dining room, full bathroom in basement, driveway, quiet community, silestone counters, Basement, Garage, Patio. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(301) 656-8765 - Great two level 2BR/ 1BA Silver Spring Condo (Walk to Metro) - Welcome home to your two level 2BR/ 1BA condo with a GREAT location!
Cozy living area with wall to wall carpet throughout the property. Kitchen has granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, gas stove and updated cabinetry. Walk upstairs to two bedrooms and one full bath.
When you venture out, everything you'll need will be at the tips of your toes. A mere 10 minute walk to the Silver Spring Metro, restaurants and shopping!!!
Email Lauren Mitchum at Lauren@StreamlineManagement.com to see this fantastic property today!
Lease Terms:
*1 month security deposit required
*12 month minimum lease
*Sorry, no pets
*No smoking 
*Renter's insurance required
*Water included in the rent
*Tenant responsible for Gas and Electric 
To apply, please visit our website at www.StreamlineManagement.com , go to "Available Properties," scroll down to the property you are interested in and click "Apply Now" button. Please be sure to fill out all information correctly and provide requested documents. The application fee must be paid in order for the application to be reviewed.
(RLNE3458428) Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(301) 656-8765 - Magnificent 3BR / 2BA Rambler on Quaint Street - Welcome home! Open your front door and step on to gleaming hardwood floors which you'll find throughout the entire first floor. Enjoy hanging out with friends and family in your living room or enjoy a meal the dining area. Updated eat-
in kitchen has stainless steel appliances. Sneak away to the sun room for some reading or relaxing. The main level has 3 bedrooms & 2 full baths- the master bathroom has been updated! Go downstairs to your finished basement/ rec room, large utility room with laundry and ample storage. There is a one car garage and large driveway. Gorgeous well kept yard!
No Cats Allowed
(RLNE3424606) Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(240) 620-8226 - Well Maintained SF** 3-3.5** Home w/ Fenced Rear Yard - Very Nice Single Family Home! Hardwood on main and upper levels, carpeted finished basement - 3 bedrooms / 2.5 baths. Stainless Steel Appliances, Nice Hardscape/Rear Patio, Fenced In Yard - Shed on property. Nicely updated Bathrooms. 
Community has Pools and Tennis clubs nearby. Located super close to Layhill Shopping Center & Argyle Country Club!! Also close to Bethesda, ICC RT 200, DC NIH, Walter Reed and more!

Description:
(443) 758-1005 - Beautiful 1BR/BA Condo in Silver Spring, MD - Beautiful first floor 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom condo located in Silver Spring offering many amenities! Nestled in a quiet wooded neighborhood, this property is convenient to all major commuter highways and several great shops and restaurants that downtown Silver Spring has to offer. Features include gorgeous hardwood flooring throughout with a separate living room/dining room area. The eat-in galley kitchen has updated updated appliances, tiled floors, a breakfast bar and custom wine glass rack. A spacious bedroom has plenty of closet space and leads out to a full bath with tiled floors, tiled shower enclosure and new vanity! Separate laundry area with washer/dryer included. Enjoy a large balcony great for entertaining and the convenience of assigned parking.
Pets under 30lbs considered on a case by case basis with an additional Pet Deposit.
Contact Sophia at (443) 758-1005 for details or to schedule an appointment or email scolon@baymgmtgroup.com
Here is the link to apply online:
http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/
Good Credit Score required. Any slightly lower scores will be considered on a case by case basis.
(RLNE3316753) Other Amenities - Parking, Other- hardwood floors, fully equipped kitchen, eat-in kitchen, Balcony. Appliances - Air Conditioning, Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.

Description:
(301) 237-4950 - Fully Furnished Property Across the Street from a Coffeeshop and a Short Stroll to Metro... Free Utilities! - Where to begin... the amazing location, the fantastic building, or that you can walk through the front door with only a suit case and you'll have everything you need?
The Mica is located a block from the Silver Spring Metro station, across the street from Bump 'n Grind, a 2 minute walk to Giant and so so close to all that downtown Silver Spring has to offer. The bars, restaurants, movie theater and everything else that makes this an exciting place to experience.
Within your building you'll get to enjoy a gym, outdoor swimming pool and media room. All recently renovated and well kept. A reserved parking space is included.
The unit itself is what will make you extremely comfortable. Both bedrooms, the living room, dining room and kitchen have all been fully furnished with fine furniture, including a television, dishes and cutlery. 
Please email Scott Goldberg at Scott@StreamlineManagement.com to see this great place.
Lease terms:
12 month minimum lease
No smoking
Sorry, no pets
Available now
Building charges a $500 move in fee
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3289170) Other Amenities - Other- media room, reserved parking space, Pool, Exercise Facility. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(443) 758-1005 - Updated 1BR/1BA Second Floor Condo in Silver Spring! Close to Major Commuter Routes! - Beautiful second floor 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom condo located in Silver Spring offering many amenities! Nestled in a quiet wooded neighborhood, this property is convenient to all major commuter highways and several great shops and restaurants that downtown Silver Spring has to offer. Features include a separate living room/dining room area and an eat-in galley kitchen that has stainless steel appliances, custom tiled floors and updated cabinets. A large bedroom has plenty of closet space and leads out to a full bath with tiled floors, custom tiled shower and laundry area with newer washer/dryer included. Enjoy a large balcony great for entertaining and the convenience of assigned parking!
Pets considered on a case by case basis with additional pet deposit.
Contact Sophia at (443) 758-1005 for details or to schedule an appointment or email scolon@baymgmtgroup.com
Here is the link to apply online:
http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/
Good Credit Score required. Any slightly lower scores will be considered on a case by case basis.
(RLNE2682959) Other Amenities - Parking, Other- fully equipped kitchen, walk in closet, stainless steel appliances, eat-in kitchen, custom tiled floors, Balcony. Appliances - Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(301) 250-1721 - $2995 - 4 bed 2.5 bath - Silver Spring Home - Updated Kitchen - This 4 bedroom 2.5 bathroom colonial is nestled in a serene, park-like setting and is located close to downtown Silver Spring and Washington, DC. 
Inside on the main floor you can find a spacious living room, separate dining area, large den, bedroom with attached bathroom, and a kitchen that features an island, stainless appliances, granite counter tops, and contemporary cabinets. 
Upstairs, you'll have 3 bedrooms and an updated full bathroom.
On the lower floor the finished basement rec room, half bathroom, 2 large storage rooms, a attached garage, and additional utility room with washer and dryer.
Located just a short distance from downtown Silver Spring and only blocks away from Sligo Creek Park trails, and playgrounds. 
If all that wasn't enough this location provides easy access to commuter routes (29, 495, Georgia Ave, 16th St, Seminary Rd), the Metro, and just a short distance from downtown Silver Spring and only blocks away from Sligo Creek Park trails, and playgrounds. 
Lease terms: 
*$45 application fee required 
*1 months rent security deposit required 
*Sorry, no smoking inside the property 
*Min 12 month lease 
*Pets are not accepted 
*Tenant responsible for utilities (water, gas & electric)
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE2625996) Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(240) 997-3585 - Renovated 3 Bed 2 Bath Condo at Longmeade Crossing in Silver Spring. - Enter the top floor apartment into a foyer with coat closet. The foyer opens into a spacious living room/dining room combo (22x13) with polished hardwood flooring. Renovated kitchen comes equipped with an electric oven, refrigerator, dishwasher and garbage disposal along with ample cabinet space and a large open pass. Hallway in living room leads back to the bedrooms. The two front bedrooms (12x11) (12x11) both have hardwood floors and share use of a renovated hall bath. The master bedroom (15x11) also has hardwood floors along with a walk-in closet and renovated bath. Laundry room also located in the hallway. Water is included in the rent. Available mid-October. To inquire, please call WMS at 240-997-3585. No pets, please.
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE2583741) Other Amenities - Other- assigned parking in lot, Pool. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(240) 620-8226 - Spacious Renovated Split-Level in Silver Spring, Deck and - Great 5bd/2ba home with hardwood floors throughout. Main level features sunny kitchen, living, dining and family room! Upper level features master bedroom and 2 additional bedrooms plus renovated full bath. LL features laundry room, gorgeous bathroom and 2 additional bedrooms. Large rear yard boasts fabulous deck and pretty landscaping. Two car driveway and ample street parking available! Super close to commuter routes, Sligo Creek Park, shopping and more.

(RLNE2567800) Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(240) 339-3399 - Available November 1. Nice Basement 1 BR Apartment. Hardwood Floors, Small Building. Quiet Street. - This is a beautiful basement level apartment, which is located at 8105 Greenwood Ave in Takoma Park, MD 20912. The apartment is a part of a small, garden style brick building in a quiet street. There are total of six apartments in the building. 
The apartment plenty of natural light even in a dark day.
The apartment has beautiful hard wood floors.
The kitchen has full size (30") stove and full size refrigerator and plenty of beautiful cabinets. 
There is access to a coin-operated laundry room.
Window unit Air Conditioner is provided free of charge.
There is a nice patio on the right side of the house, which can be used for relaxing, BBQ etc.
Rent includes hot water, sewer and trash.
Rent DOES NOT INCLUDE electricity and heating and cooking gas, cable and telephone.
Electric bill runs about $15-20/mo in the winter and little more in the summer depending on the A/C usage. The heating charge is a flat fee of $50/mo paid directly to landlord in addition to the base rent.
There is access to a laundry room in the building.
Extra storage is available free of charge.
1.5 mi to the Metro (Takoma), RideOn bus and UM Shuttle stop is around the block.
The apartment is located within minutes of walking from shopping, Sligo Creek Parkway, Long Branch Parkway and is on a bus line. Minutes from 495-Beltway and newly developed downtown Silver Spring.
1.5 mi to the Metro (Takoma), bus stop is around the block.
Washington Adventist Hospital is five to ten minutes walking distance.
We accept pets! (Pet fee of $40/mo for a dog, $30/mo for a cat)
We can show you the apartment every day except Saturday.
REQUIREMENTS: 1-year lease, 1 month security deposit, good credit.
No smoking within 30 feet from the property!
APARTMENT WILL BE RENTED UNFURNISHED!
(RLNE2486390) Other Amenities - Other- small building, quiet street, near transportation, near playground, near park. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(240) 620-8226 - Gorgeous Rambler w/ Screened in Porch, Fenced Yard and Storage! - Adorable rambler in Indian Springs. Nice airy living spaces, great flow, updated kitchen and bathrooms! Fireplace, large fenced yard w/shed (gardening and lawn tools included), walk-out partially finished basement and a STUNNING screened in porch perfect for relaxation and entertaining! This picture perfect property is located just inside the beltway at exit 29, close to Sligo Creek Pkwy and Colesville Rd. Great access to commuter routes, metro, shopping, restaurants and downtown Silver Spring!
No Cats Allowed
(RLNE2465454) Pet policies - No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(301) 339-8850 - 1 BR/1BA Condo. All utilities included. Walk to Metro - Live in a great community steps away from Forest Glen Metro station and just off 495. This spacious 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo has a step-down living room with a lovely brick accent wall, as well as a separate dining area with access to a balcony. The bedroom is quite large and has a walk-in closet. 
This is a top-floor condo so it is very quiet. The community offers many amenities including swimming pool and tennis courts and free permit parking. All utilities are included in the rent and free laundry is available in the building.
(RLNE2454914) Other Amenities - Other- walking distance to metro, all utilites included, community tennis courts, Pool, Balcony. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range.

Description:
(240) 483-7255 - Large Condo with Stunning Panoramic View - Welcome home to your 12th floor, spacious one bedroom one bathroom condo where the list of updates is endless. When you first walk into your unit take in the view from the double sliding glass doors in the living room, bringing in tons of natural light. Separate dinning and living room areas feature brand new hardwood flooring with plenty of space for lounging or entertaining. To enjoy the view even more, head out onto your private balcony.
Walk into the kitchen which features brand new granite counter tops, recently installed stainless steel appliances including GAS range. Plenty of cabinets for storage and even space for a kitchen table.
Head down the hall to the master bedroom where you once again can take in the magnificent views from the double floor to ceiling windows. Closet space is no issue here as the bedroom features an oversized walk-in closet.
Along with the buildings unbeatable location close to many commuter routes, parks, trails, and streams. Parkside Plaza also offers high quality amenities such as; fitness center with steam room, outdoor pool, party room, 24-hour front desk, and shuttle service to metro and grocery store.
Lease terms
* $40 application fee required per adult applicant
* 1 months rent security deposit required
* All utilities included
* Pets are not accepted or this property 
* 12 month min lease 
* Building charges a $150.00 move-in fee
Email Mike@streamlinemanagement.com to schedule a showing.
(RLNE2375264)

Description:
(240) 339-3399 - Available December 1! Large Beautiful Apartment, Small Building, Hardwood Floors, Dishwasher, Bring Your Pet! - The apartment is located at 8405 Greenwood Ave. in Takoma Park, MD 20912. It's a small, garden style brick building on a quiet street. There are total of three apartments in the building. 
The apartment is located on the ground floor. The apartment has beautiful hardwood floors, spacious eat-in kitchen large refrigerator and full size (30") gas stove and a dishwasher.
There are plenty of window in the apartment, bringing nice natural light into the apartment. All windows are dual pane.
There are two large closets in the bedroom and one large closet in the hallway. 
The apartment has private entrance. 
Tenant has complete control over heat via thermostat in the apartment. 
Rent includes hot water, sewer and trash. Rent DOES NOT INCLUDE electricity and gas, cable and telephone. Electric bill runs about $15-20/mo in the winter and little more in the summer depending on the A/C usage. Gas bill runs about $35-50/mo average (more in the winter and less in the summer). 
Window unit Air Conditioner is provided free of charge. 
There is a direct access to a coin-operated laundry room from the apartment. Washington Adventist Hospital is five to ten minutes away on foot. 1.5 mi to the Metro (Takoma), RideOn bus and UM Shuttle stop is around the block. 
Plenty of closet space - three large closets throughout the apartment. 
The property has a back deck, which tenant can use for relaxing and BBQ.
The apartment is located within minutes of walking from shopping, Sligo Creek Parkway, Long Branch Parkway and is on a bus line. Minutes from 495-Beltway and newly developed downtown Silver Spring. We accept pets! (Pet fee of $50/mo for a dog, $40/mo for a cat +$250 one time charge).
Requirements: 1-year lease, 1 month security deposit, good credit. 
Directions from 495/Beltway: 
Take exit 29B/University Blvd 
Right on Piney Branch Road 
Left on Greenwood Ave
(RLNE2373906) Other Amenities - Other- small building, quiet street, near transportation, near park, vintage building. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(240) 339-3399 - Gorgeous, Sunny, Ground Level Apartment, Private Entrance, Lots of storage, Small Building, Quiet Street, Pets OK! - The apartment is located at 8210 Greenwood Ave in Takoma Park, MD 20912. It's a small, garden style brick building in a quiet street. There are total of six apartments in the building. 
The apartment is located on a ground level and has it's own private entrance with a porch. 
Even though the apartment is located on the ground level, IT IS NOT A BASEMENT APARTMENT! 
The apartment is about 600 sq ft. There are plenty of window in the apartment. Since the apartment is facing the south side of the building, it is very bright even in a dark winter day. 
There are beautiful hardwood floors throughout the apartment. The apartment is very clean and well maintained. 
Window unit Air Conditioner is provided free of charge. 
Rent DOES NOT INCLUDE electricity and gas, cable and telephone. Rent includes hot water, sewer and trash. Electric bill runs about $15-20/mo in the winter and little more in the summer depending on the A/C usage. Gas bill runs about $30-50/mo average (more in the winter and less in the summer). 
There is access to a coin-operated laundry room in the basement of the building. 1.5 mi to the Metro (Takoma), bus stop is three minutes walking distance . Washington Adventist Hospital is five to seven minutes away on foot. 
There is plenty of street parking near the apartment. 
The apartment is located within minutes of walking from shopping, Sligo Creek Parkway, Long Branch Parkway and is on a bus line. Minutes from 495-Beltway and newly developed downtown Silver Spring. RideOn bus and UM Shuttle stop is within 300 yards from the apartment. 
We accept pets! (Pet fee of $50/mo for a dog, $40/mo for a cat +$250 one time fee. Non aggressive pets only) 
The apartment will be rented unfurnished. 
Requirements: 1-year lease, 1 month security deposit, good credit.
(RLNE2331973) Other Amenities - Other- small building, quiet street, near transportation, near park, vintage building. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(240) 339-3399 - Sunny and Large 1 BR Apartment, Walk-in Closet, Dishwasher, Small Building, Pets OK. - The apartment is located at 8408 Greenwood Ave in Takoma Park, MD 20912. It's a small, garden style brick building in a quiet street. There are total of five apartments in the building. 
The apartment is located on a 2nd floor on the South side and has plenty of natural light.
The apartment has a lot of windows and there is plenty of sunlight. The apartment has beautiful hard wood floors, living room closet, linen closet and a huge walk-in closet in the bedroom. 
The apartment has a spacious dining area. 
There are ceiling fans in the living room and the bedroom. 
The apartment has new beautiful high efficiency vinyl windows installed couple of years ago. 
The new IKEA kitchen has recently been installed and has a dishwasher. 
Rent includes hot water, sewer and trash. Rent DOES NOT INCLUDE electricity, gas, cable and telephone. Electric bill runs about $15-25/mo in the winter and little more in the summer depending on the A/C usage. Gas bill runs about $30-50/mo on average (more in the winter and less in the summer). Window unit Air Conditioner is provided free of charge. 
There are coin-operated laundry facilities available in the lower level of the building. Extra storage is available free of charge. 
Plenty of parking on the street with one off street spot on a first-come-first-servie basis.
1.5 mi to the Metro (Takoma), RideOn bus and UM Shuttle stop is around the block. The apartment is located within minutes of walking from shopping, Sligo Creek Parkway, Long Branch Parkway and is on a bus line. Minutes from 495-Beltway and newly developed downtown Silver Spring. 1.5 mi to the Metro (Takoma), bus stop is around the block. Washington Adventist Hospital is five to ten minutes walking distance. 
We accept pets! (Pet fee of $50/mo for a dog, $40/mo for a cat + $250 one time fee). Non-aggressive pets only!
REQUIREMENTS: 1-year lease, 1 month security deposit, good credit 
Please contact us schedule viewing. 
Smoking outside only!
Directions from 495/Beltway: Take exit 29B/University Blvd Right on Piney Branch Road Left on Flower Ave Left on Wabash Ave Left on Greenwood Ave
(RLNE2018230) Other Amenities - Other- small building, sunny, quiet street, near transportation, near park, vintage building. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(240) 339-3399 - Cool Two Level Loft Apartment. Quiet Street. Small Building. Plenty of Sun! - The apartment is located on the corner of Wabash Ave and Garland Ave. At 907 Wabash Ave, Takoma Park, MD 20912. 
This is a small, garden style brick building on a quiet street. There are total of six apartments in the building. 
This is an awesome two-level apartment. It is located on the second and third levels of the building. The main level has a living room, a dining area, a full kitchen and a bedroom. 
There are plenty of windows in the apartment making it very bright. There is a staircase in the living room that provides access to the loft. 
The loft has a vented skylight and a wall window. It is flooded with light even in a dark day. Make sure to follow the picture and the video links above to get see what apartment is really like.
The apartment has recently updated kitchen appliances.
There is a dining area in the apartment.
There are plenty of window in the apartment.
Window unit Air Conditioner is provided free of charge.
Rent DOES NOT INCLUDE electricity and gas, cable and telephone.
Rent includes hot water, sewer and trash.
Electric bill runs about $20-40/mo in the winter and little more in the summer depending on the A/C usage.
Gas bill runs about $40-60/mo average (more in the winter and less in the summer).
There is access to a coin-operated laundry room in the basement of the building.
Street parking only, but plenty of it.
1.5 mi to the Metro (Takoma), bus stop is across the street from the apartment.
Washington Adventist Hospital is five to seven minutes away on foot.
The apartment is located within minutes of walking from shopping, Sligo Creek Parkway, Long Branch Parkway and is on a bus line as well as UM Shuttle line. Minutes from 495-Beltway and newly developed downtown Silver Spring.
We accept pets! (Pet fee of $50/mo for a dog, $40/mo for a cat +$250 one time fee) 
The apartment will be rented unfurnished.
Requirements: 1-year lease, 1 month security deposit, good credit.
(RLNE1904588)

Description:
(202) 813-6732 - An executive self-contain apartment available. - Property Id: 23694
This is a Single-Family Home located at 14315 New Hampshire Avenue, Silver Spring, MD. The apartment has it's own private amenities, including washer and dryer, cooker, microwave and stainless steel Fridge/Freezer, granite kitchen countertop and oak finished kitchen cabinet, 1 full baths a large living area and bedroom, Personal garage parking will be an option.
Interested person can request for pictures or call 2028136732 to request viewing.
Apply at TurboTenant: http://rent.turbotenant.com/properties/14315-new-hampshire-ave 
Property Id 23694
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3476500) Other Amenities - Other- Cable Ready. Appliances - Refrigerator, Range, Oven, Washer & Dryer, Other- Freezer, Microwave. Lease lengths - 12 Months. Details regarding this property's Utilities - Electricity Included, Gas Included, Trash Pick-up Included. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Pets Allowed.

Description:
(301) 250-1721 - 1 Bed 1 Bath - Silver Spring Condo - Washer Dryer In Unit - This fantastic 1 bedroom 1 bathroom located in The Mica is a block from the Silver Spring Metro station, a 2 minute walk to Giant, and all the bars, restaurants, movie theater and all the other convinces if living downtown. 
The condo features hardwood floors throughout, a spacious living room with large windows that leads out to a private balcony, an updated kitchen that features granite counter tops and stainless appliances. 
The master bedroom and can accommodate up to a king size bed. Best of all there is a large walk in closet, and stack washer dryer in the bedroom as well. In the hallway you will find a updated full bathroom with tub. 
The building features a gym, outdoor swimming pool and media room. All recently renovated and well kept. 
Lease Terms:
*$45 Application Fee Required
*1 month rent Security Deposit Required
*Building charges a $500 move in fee
*Minimum 12 month lease 
*Pets are not accetped
* Smoking is not permitted inside of the residence
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3544291) Other Amenities - Other- secured entrances, lobby, community center, media room, Pool, Exercise Facility. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(240) 483-7255 - Charming Rambler on quiet cul-de-sac! - Charming Rambler on quiet cul-de-sac close to Downtown Bethesda & Silver Spring. This home was completely updated five years ago and features beautiful all white kitchen with breakfast nook, hardwood floors, large formal living room with wood-burning fireplace and custom built-in shelving. Spacious master bedroom with ensuite bath that has multiple shower heads! Rear deck with newly landscaped yard.
Please email Mike Hangemanole at Mike@StreamlineManagement.com to schedule a showing.
To Apply:
Please visit www.streamlinemanagement.com, click on the available rentals tab at the top of the page, click on the apply now button next to this listing. Each adult applicant must fill out their own application and pay $40 application fee.
(RLNE3507110)

Description: At Silver Spring House Apartments, your quality of life is our number one priority! With large spacious bedrooms, massive closets, beautifully refinished hardwood floors and ample living space throughout each apartment home, to an unbelievably convenient location; Silver Spring House has it all! We are located in a lovely residential neighborhood, yet very close to the heart of Silver Spring and located directly on the Ride-On bus line. Here is just a few more reasons to choose Silver Spring House as your new home; each apartment comes with such nuances as accent cabinetry in a gourmet style kitchen, access controlled entry way, free and ample parking, sweeping private patios and oversized balconies, individually controlled heating & A/C with ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED, laundry facilities on EACH floor, and enormous living and dining room areas. Professionally managed by Dreyfuss Management, where putting our residents first is the foundation of our stellar customer service that includes a 24-hour emergency maintenance team. Come visit Silver Spring House today for spacious, elegantly styled apartment living at an affordable price. You will be so glad that you did!

Description:
In the heart of Silver Spring, The Fields of Silver Spring puts you right in the middle of one of the DC area’s most popular communities.
Surrounded by shopping and dining, The Fields of Silver Spring offers you everything you want close to home. Enjoy a central location – minutes from downtown DC, I-495 and Georgia Avenue
Walk to the Wheaton or Forest Glen Metros.
Catch a movie at the classic Silver Theater
Find exceptional dining, shopping and entertainment in newly renovated downtown Silver Spring.
The Fields of Silver Spring offers one-bedroom and two-bedroom apartment homes

Description: Located above beautiful Sligo Creek Park and in the heart of Silver Spring, Maryland, Tanglewood Apartments offers residents both lovely vistas and a convenient location. These newly renovated studio, one and two bedroom apartments offer large kitchens with oak cabinetry and modern appliances. Each apartment home has generous closet and living space as well as the peace of mind provided by free utilities.

Description:
Arbor Crest Senior Apartments offers all the comforts of home. With only 80 apartments, our residents and on-site team feel like family! We are located close to shopping, medical facilities and all that the Maryland and Washington DC areas have to offer. Major transportation is close by and we offer an exclusive van service for our residents. At Arbor Crest we believe in having fun too. From happy hours to community parties, you will find friendship around every corner! A 62 or Better Community!
Perfect for active, independent seniors.

Description: Located in Silver Spring, Maryland, Hampshire Village is a thriving, smoke-free apartment community where over 110 seniors call home. At Hampshire Village, we know that where you live is just as important as how you live. That is why we have designed an attractive senior rental community where you can enjoy active, independent lifestyles, without sacrificing quality or affordability. If you need more living space and more amenities, then look no further than Hampshire Village. Each of our two bedroom apartment homes features a fully-equipped kitchen with dishwasher, wall-to-wall carpeting, and large, energy-efficient thermopane windows. For your peace of mind, all apartment homes are equipped with emergency pull cords in the bedrooms and baths. In addition, pets are welcome at Hampshire Village. Our spacious apartment homes are only the beginning of what Hampshire Village has to offer. From weekly coffee socials in our café to lively pool tournaments in our billiards room, Hampshire Village is a community brimming with friendship, activity, and fun. You can join our resident exercise team for a brisk morning walk, attend a lunchtime meeting in our grand lounge, visit our onsite health suite for a checkup, and watch a film with friends in our movie theater, all in one day without ever leaving the community. Our 24-hour emergency maintenance service team is always just a phone call away. All this and more awaits you at Hampshire Village, where active living is always enjoyable and affordable.

Description: Now accecpting applications for our waitlist. Visit our temporary office located at 911 Silver Spring Ave, Silver Spring, MD. Brand new apartments tentatively available November 1st. Beautifully designed, affordable apartment building serving mixed-income households. Uniquely designed, these residences are close to the burgeoning Silver Spring Central Business District, steps away from the Metro Red Line, MARC station, and a plethora of County bus lines. Many government employment centers nearby. Close to two major supermarkets, Safeway and Whole Foods. Walk to the central business district with stores like City Place Mall, Borders, the Majestic Theater, Men's Warehouse, and many other businesses.

Description:
Now Open!
Seniors aged 62+ now have a great opportunity to blend city living with affordability. Located in the heart of bustling downtown Silver Spring, the Bonifant is a modern 11-story, 149-apartment community designed to cater to today’s senior. If residents can’t find what they are looking for in the 6,300 square foot retail space on the first floor, they won’t have to go too far to find it. Grocery stores, health and senior services, farmers’ markets, restaurants to suit every taste and a brand new public library are all conveniently located within walking distance. Along with access to modern city conveniences, the Bonifant also comes with a 98 Walk Score?(R). Only blocks away from the Silver Spring station on the Red Line, our seniors have ready access to all of the amenities and excitement that city living has to offer, all a few steps from their front door.

Description:
Enjoy easy access to the Metropolitan Washington, DC area from our Silver Spring apartments at Langley Gardens. In a location that offers shopping and Metro bus services nearby, as well as a shuttle bus service to the University of Maryland. Our residents enjoy
central air conditioning, spacious interiors, ceramic tile bathrooms, thermal pane windows, on-site laundry facilities, professionally landscaped and community recreation room. Call Us Today!

Description: Picture a magnificent Silver Spring, Maryland senior apartment community for active adults age 62 or over, in a premier residential neighborhood surrounded by outdoor recreation, inviting plazas, and walkways. Imagine a setting alive with things to do in state-of-the-art facilities, like a 48-seat theater and multi-purpose entertainment center, sun-filled social lounges, a fitness center, computer and billiards room, and more. Next, add the peace of mind of a controlled-entry environment and the luxury of amenity-filled, one and two bedroom apartments, and you’ll arrive at Randolph Village. Bring your pets with you and enjoy the smoke-free environment. Come, discover Randolph Village, a thriving community that over 130 seniors call home; where a lifestyle rich in amenities is more than just a dream; it’s an affordable reality.

Description: Conveniently located just minutes from I-495, the ICC, downtown Silver Spring and Washington DC, our apartments in Wheaton, MD at Amherst Gardens offers residents more than a great location. Each one or two bedroom apartment home comes with wall to wall carpeting and modern kitchens with newly updated appliances. Residents also enjoy expanded living space with either a balcony or terrace. Income guidelines apply—ask the Leasing Consultant for details.

Description: Our beautifully designed one, two, and three bedroom apartments offer breakfast nook with butler counter, cozy fireplace, washer and dryer and formal dining room. There is also an option of a den. The floorplans include a balcony or patio and some have dramatic vaulted ceilings. The community offers a fitness center, volleyball court, multi-purpose court and playground. Dring's Reach has a central Silver Spring location with shopping, dining, schools and entertainment all nearby. There is a bus stop at the community entrance and the property is near Rt. 29 and I-95.

Description: Blair Park combines old fashioned charm and modern conveniences to create perfect apartment lifestyle. Choose from an efficiency, one or two bedroom apartment, all of which have been completely renewed to include new appliances, new kitchen cabinets, central air conditioning and wall to wall carpeting. Blair Park’s convenient location means commuting to DC or Silver Spring is a breeze. Dining, shopping and entertainment are all within easy reach. And, Jessup Blair Park is across the street, providing recreation and wonderful scenic views.

Description: As part of the Legacy Area, 7610 Maple is a part of a vibrant civic streetscape project that will further enhance Takoma Park’s reputation as a desired place to call home. You will be able to join your neighbors in active civic organizations, concerts, art exhibits and volunteer action projects in an environment that is welcoming and robust.
